1.title: The Start..

111.content:
You are a giant 1 year old 150 ft tall baby boy who one fateful day unfortunately woke up tired and groggy, wearing nothing but a skyscraper sized diaper around his waist and decided to take it out on an entire unsuspecting city itself.

Everyone who lived in the entire unsuspecting city was going about their business until they stopped dead in their tracks upon hearing what appeared to be giant footsteps heading right towards them, as they immediately noticed you stomping down their city streets and commenced wreaking havoc upon the city itself as they began fleeing in complete and utter terror from you.

1131.content:
You are Mike, only 3 years old. You awoke to find your stomach empty, when you went to sleep last night it was full of tiny little squirming people. But now that feeling is gone. There are so many tiny people in this world, and so few big kids like you. You awoke in your diaper and white shirt. Your diaper was pretty full from last night, some of the blended people you drank down found there way out of your body...and into your diaper, making it sag as you stood up. Mike stretched, and walked into the kitchen. Stepping on some tinies on the floor not making it out of his way fast enough. He loves the way they squish and mush under his giant feet. Mike was about 150 feet tall to the little people, and that's a smaller giant compared to some of the older kids. Mike sees one plump guy on the floor, reaches down, and brings the screaming squirming bug to his giant face. He stuffs him into his giant mouth, and starts chewing on him. Giggling at the squishy person in his mouth. He finally swallows the poor man and rubs his tummy

Plenty more where that one came from. Thought Mike.

Does he keep eating or go do something else?
1131.title: Boy

11311.content:
He loved the feeling of his victim sliding down his throat. He held his tummy as it called for more. "Looks like my tummy wants more food." He saw that there were many people around his house. He smiled at them and started walking after them. They were running away from this giant toddler. He reached down and picked up a little bug. "Save you for later", Mike told the little person. Then he opened up his diaper and shoved the person inside. He giggled as the person was squirming in his diaper. He kept walking after the other people. He shoved more people into his diaper. Eventually he had half the people shoved into his diaper.

He stomped after the others until he trapped them against a wall. He sat down, squishing a few of his diaper captives. He giggled as the blood stained his diaper. Mike yelled out that it was time for breakfast. He reached into his full diaper and grabbed one of the people. He held his diaper open so the others could watch. He lifted the victim to his face and smiled. The tiny was pleading with Mike to spare him. Mike just laughed and tossed the person into his mouth. He swished the person around inside. The others could see the person squirming inside his mouth Then Mike tilted his head back and gulped his victim whole. He moaned in delight as the bug slid down his throat. He started shoving the remaining people in his diaper into his mouth, one by one. Then he would smile as he gulped them whole. The people trapped outside his diaper looked on in horror as they could see a bulge slide down his throat.

Once Mike had finished the people in his diaper, he rubbed his tummy and smiled. "Those people are always tasty." His other captives could see the people squirming in his stomach. After a few minutes, the people stopped squirming. All that was left was mush inside Mike's belly. Mike let out a loud burp, and smiled. Then he frowned and started itching at his diaper because it was starting to get annoying. Then he got an idea for his other captives.

"Change diaper now!" These people stared at his sagging diaper and gulped in fear. Mike told the people to "Change diaper or be squished!" They said ok, and Mike shoved them into his diaper. He walked over to the changing table and got a diaper, wipes and powder. He took the people out of the diaper and lay down. He spread his legs and reminded them what would happen if they didn’t change him.

They grabbed the clean diaper and slid it beneath him. A few of them climbed up to undo the Velcro. When they did, the diaper fell of him. The smell was overwhelming. The people were also horrified at the sound of the gore inside. They knew that they had to keep going. They cleaned him up as best they could with the old diaper. Then they finished cleaning him up with a few wipes. They put the wipes inside the diaper and slid it out from beneath him. They sprinkled on the powder to make sure he didn’t get a rash. They pulled the front of the diaper up to his waist and redid the Velcro.

When Mike heard the diaper Velcro shut, he sat up again. He looked over the diaper and was surprised that they did so well. “Good job, now go back into diaper.” He picked them up and shoved them inside the diaper. He giggled again as they squirmed inside his diaper.
11311.title: People For Breakfast

11312.content: As you wonder what to do you realized you are just bored so...you grab a jar and go hunt for some more tinies. Since you lived in the city there wer absolutely EVERYWERE. From stuck in the toilets to inside building and even around the streets. As you walked outside you saw a lot of other kids doing the exact same thing you were gonna do. You new with all the tinies there were that you would not run out but just in case... You decided to stock pile for a long time. you grabbed a couple boxes and vegans to collect your new prizes. one buy one you scooped up tinies by handful. as you collect them you hear there tiny screams as they are helplessly picked up by this giant 3 year old. looking at their horrified facets made you feel so powerful. Imagining being hem and being so overpowered by a little kid and being helplessly toyed by a giant babies and not being able to to anything about it...just able to wait in horror as they await their doom...from being crush, squished, sat on, ate, used as a sex toy, riped in half, or just painfully tortured. after about 2 hours of scooping up little tinies you go home with 2 boxes full of tinies. All together you have exactly 500 of them. The though of having so much tiny people at your mercy gave you a rush of energy. As you looked down at the box of terrified tiny people you wonder how you are gonna keep them all. Then you got an idea...you leave the box there and go get a 10 year old. "Hey can you help me with somthing" you say hardly. "Yes what can I help you with?" The 10 year old girl says. "I need help making a home for some tinies I collected" you say as you smiled. "Sure I'll help you but only if you give me about 40 tinies" she says with a smile. "Deal" you say(apperently your a very smart kid and able to talk at the age of three...crazy. as you go home you wonder what she is gonna bring. as you wait for about 3 hours she comes back with some glue and a lot of fruit in a card, some wood beam, little prices of cloth, and some matches. "Ok here what's I'm gonna do for you, bassicaly I'm gonna build little camps for them say camp will be selected by huge beams that will be impossible for them to climb over since they are only 1 inch tall. I'll build little tents they can sleep in and the matches are for fire. Also I got some food from a wall mart and since they are tiny this food will last them a REALLY long time. there will be 5 camps in one whole room. 1 in each corner and one in the middle. all you have to do is give them food each week and put some caps with water in the camps and your ready to start collect a lot more tinies!!!"as you hear this and a immediately new she was a smart girl. " ok cool" you say and she gets to work[a few hours ltr] "ok I'm done " she says. As you enter the room it's look exactly like she said it would. ok well now that I helped you...

You get some boxes and start grabbing...after hours and hours of collecting to the tiny worthless bugs you counted up to 1000. "Holy moly" you say as you look into the 4 boxes. You take them all home and split them up into the camps. Within a few hours all the cakes have Ben filled up. You felt like a true GOD now. as you sit down from exhaustion from all that work you just did you wondered what your gonna do now...

113121121.content: You sat there thinking of what to do and you finally got an idea...."ok I feel like squishing some of dem under my butt" you say with a smile on your face.you go to a camp and look over onto it. 121.content:
You are always attracted by little insects, se them and study their way of life. But from that day you saw a spider eat a little ant you understand that the biggest and the strongest eat the smallest, this was a rule of nature so you decided to follow this rule and from the fact you were biggest than them now you knew they must finish in you stomach.
You went out in your garden to search some insect to swallow down whole in your young hungry stomach.
Your attention was captured by a little worm that, not knowing what it was happening to him, went for his way.
You took him and said: I'm sorry little worm but I'm bigger than you so you will be devoured by me. Don't worry you will come out from my body but as my poop eheheh. And said that you opened your mouth and the poor worm disappeared inside, it tried to exit from that wet, slimy and dangerous trap but you sucked him like a noodle and you love noodles. With one big gulp the worm was gone inside and you talked to him: see my little snack, I must grow up so I must eat sooo much and now you are all mine and you cannot escape, bye bye Bobby win and you lost eheh and touching his belly released a big belch.
From that days he eat all things that move, all things with wings: flies, ants, spiders, worms etc, he has eaten hundreds of poor unfortunate guys that finish in that hungry stomach of a 5 years old boy, and he loved to feel them inside wriggling and tryng desperately to exit before to be digested alive.
But one day something changed...
All adults shrunk and you know what happen to little beings...
121.title: 5 y/o boy named Bobby

choices: Let him watch you poop out the bugs
1211.content: You walk into your house and find your big brother shrunken down to the size of insect in the hallway. Your stomach growls hungrily and you grin, “hey bro, I just ate some buggies” you say in a singsong voice. He yells up at your massive body, but you quickly drown him out with a stinky fart. “The buggies I ate are in my butt now” you said a massive grin splitting your face “so my tummy needs more food”. Your brother finally grasping the situation, turns and begins to run away from you. Playfully, you stroll after him easily able to keep up at your size. You reach down and grab him holding him up to your mouth, stinky breath washing over him. “It’s okay you will come out, just as my poo” you tell him in a matter of fact voice, before beginning to move your hand to your mouth. Suddenly a squelching groan emanates from your lower body, “Oh, looks like buggies have to leave, should I poop first”?
1211.title: You start to eat people of your family

125.content: You are a nine year old girl with fair skin, long red hair, and blue eyes. You are pretty tall for your age. One day, you found yourself even taller. Everyone over the age of 10 had shrunk!
125.title: a 9 y/o girl named Vicky

1251.content:
You are starving, so you head outside, thinking that you could now eat all the junk food in the world, wherever it is. Your parents always said that you would lose your slim body if you ate that stuff all the time, but who cares about them, you probably flattened them on the way out with your bare feet.

However, you are intrigued by a different food source now...you see a group of terrified shrunken people running away from you. Quickly, you bend down and grab them in your fist. Your stomach growls, so you drop them into your mouth. It's a big mouthful, so you chew some of it, and the taste of the people is awesome and sweet to you.

*GULP* You swallow your snack. The people who are still alive struggle in your stomach, and that makes you all burpy. Amidst your several tiny burps, you unleash a few massive belches. After your snack has all settled and you finally stop burping, you feel nice and full.
1251.title: You are starving

choices: Torture those remaining, then look for more
12513.content:
Fuck it, people are meant to be food for you now. Why let anyone go until you absolutely can't eat anymore?

Your shadow falls over an escaping group of scared adults, some of whom had seen you gobble up those other guys a moment ago. You bend down and trap about 20 of them in your huge fist. Giggling, you see their terrified faces as your clenched hand hangs over your wide open mouth. Then, with a quick release, the mass of shrunken people is dropped from the confines of your palm deep into your maw. You shut it tight and chew, loving the taste of it all. After a minute or so, you get ready to swallow the big mound of masticated tinies and the few still left alive.

*GULP*

A noticeable lump travels down your throat, and vanishes beyond your collarbone. Then, you feel a satisfying filling sensation as your stomach expands to fit the latest meal. In total, about 30-40 tiny people, digested, chewed up, or otherwise, are cramped within your belly. Your bloated tummy gurgles fiercely, starting to digest the new food. You proudly let out an earth-rattling burp while patting your noisy stomach. The tiny people still left below you look up at the sound of that belch to find a giant 9 year old with a round, pale distended belly echoing with rumbles.
12513.title: Stuff yourself

1332.title: Girl age 9

choices: Eat or play with some of them
13321.content:
"I'm hungry." The girl says, and you almost have a heart attack. She tosses you into her mouth, covers you in sticky saliva, before finally gulping you down into her waiting stomach. The girl sighs contentedly and looks for more people to play with and eat.

You fall into the bottom of this girl's belly, into a thick pool of stomach acid. The giant deadly pool pretty much vaporizes you in no time, as you are a very small snack to the giant girl.

The girl smiles as she is teasing some other people, feeling her stomach gurgle as it finishes you. She burps, right into the group she's playing with, and laughs as they are scattered.
13321.title: I'm hungry

133211.content:
The girl laughs as the people start to run away. She quickly snatches a few of them up.

"You guys look tasty...my other snack sure needs company in there." The girl pats her belly as it rumbles. She tosses the few into her mouth and swishes them around, getting their full taste while she chases some more people, no doubt flattening a couple in the process. When she's bored with teasing the people in her mouth, she swallows and they enter her stomach.

"Ahh~" The girl starts to feel full, letting out another burp.
133211.title: Eat or play with some of them

choices: She wakes up later as normal
1332112.content:
Even though the girl has already eaten quite a lot, she continues to eat all the shrunken adults she can find. Each more tasty than the last, she ends up eating about thirteen before finally slowing down. Her stomach, all bloated and happily full, emits a deep gurgle, beginning to contract against the girl's large meal. The girl giggles and pats her expanded stomach as all of her snacks fight for space and air within.

The girl looks around, and sees that there isn't anyone around, after being scared away by her size and/or her devouring of people. She decides to lay down and digest her food, kicking a building down with her giant feet in the process.

As the girl rested her head up against a soft incline in the ground, she quickly began to fall asleep. A slight, smirk-ish smile spread across her face as she could feel the busy rumbling of her tummy. Lazily, she let out a huge burp, which lessened the size of her belly a bit. She played around with her belly button and fell asleep.

1332321.content:
The girl lifts you to her face, and opens her mouth. Suddenly, it appears that you've had a change of heart, but before you can say anything, the girl drops you onto her tongue. She smirks, and decides to swallow you whole. With a basic knowledge of digestion, the girl decided to keep you alive only so you could burn alive in her stomach.

You fall into her belly with a plop. It's empty inside, so all her stomach has to focus on is you. Furious, you run to the edges of this girl's belly and thrash at the walls, hoping to cause her pain. Your struggle only registers as a tickle at most, and she actually finds it pretty funny. She pats her tummy as it groans loudly, ready to start digesting you.

"No no no no no no no no!" You panic as the stomach starts to constrict and churn, pushing you into the pooling of stomach acid. Instantly, you start to burn up and scream as loud as you can. The girl laughs and keeps her hand to her belly. She can feel all of the little rumbles and gurgles that go into making you nothing but a nice snack.

After you pass out from the pain of this girl's stomach acid, she burps proudly, letting out the trapped air she swallowed along with you. To her, she has burped out the last of your meanie existence.

Now, she...

13323211.content:
"Hmm..." The girl stands, feeling that her stomach is still pretty empty after that burp. To fix that, she walks until she finds a group of shrunken people.

"Ooh, lots of snacks." She comments, which prompts some of them to begin running away, but they're not fast enough, and the girl grabs all of them.

"Aw, you guys are soooo cute," The girl smiles, "But you can't escape me and my tummy."

She drops all of them into her mouth and chews them up. Once they are all mushed together in a big saliva-coated mass, she swallows. Her new snacks fall on top of your digesting body. The girl's stomach groans loudly, having to put it lots of energy to digest all this protein.

"Ow, my stomach kinda hurts now..." The girl stops and rubs her noisy tummy. She lets out a forceful burp, as the strong digestion creates big bubbles trapping excess air.

With a full belly beginning to digest, what does she do now?

134111.content:
After several moments, as you stared up at your captor in shock, he decided for you, "Actually, I have a better idea." Jake said with an evil grin.

Walking over to the chair that sat next to the dining room table, he dropped you violently down on top of it. Howling in pain while you lie face down, you notice the light above you fade as you are caught in a shadow. Summoning enough strength to roll over onto your back, you screamed in terror at the sight above you.

"No! Not this! Please! Jake, no! I'll be good!"

Eclipsed in his shadow, your vision was filled with the white basketball shorts-clad rear-end of your humongous captor. Your pleas fell on deaf ears as you it settled lower and lower until it was just inches from your face.

"Jake! Noo-!"

As you begged, his butt settled on top of you. You could feel your legs pop first with an audible crack. You hollered in pain as the giant boy's weight settled upon them. Directly in between his monstrous cheeks, he hovered their for a moment. You could even hear him snicker as you wailed.

Soon enough, the rest of his weight came down on top of you as he sat. Your whole body disappeared beneath this gigantic ten-year-old's butt. Numerous cracks and pops of your bones snapping could be heard. As he settled in to place, he shifted from side to side, getting comfortable and surely crushing all the remaining life out of you that he possibly could.

Eventually, he stood up. He glanced behind him and chuckled at the red stain that had formed on the chair where your body had once been. As he exited through the front door of his house in pursuit of another tiny toy, your flattened form fell from the seat of his shorts and hit the floor with one final crack.

Jake had no idea, and continued on his search for a new shrunken toy to play with.
134111.title: Crushed

134122111.content:
Jake wakes up and feels an immense pressure in his backside. He stands up and lets out a long, squeaky fart, but the pressure within still remains.

Still half asleep, the preteen makes his way to the bathroom. He proceeds to take his shorts and underwear down, sits on the toilet, and lets out a thunderous fart, signalling your re-emergence to the outside world. The ten year old sighs and pushes some more as a brown, sticky log slowly slides out of his tiny hole. It falls out and makes a huge "plop" sound as it hits the toiler water. Feeling there's still more, the boy continues to push, struggling a little bit as the next log feels noticeably bigger than the first. He lets out a stream of piss while half of the turd is sticking out of his pulsating hole. Towards the end, Jake felt something, a tiny pebble, lodged not to deep within his poop, make contact against his butthole. Once he's finally done, he takes a long hard look at the bowl to figure out what that thing is. Then he sees it - your corroded skull, sticking out of the mess he created - a disgusting mixture of piss and poop. Other bone fragments can be seen throughout as well.

The boy laughs at the sight of your pathetic remains.

"Ha! Looking cool over there!" he says, smirking as he makes eye contact with your lifeless skull. "You make a great poop!"

In one final act of dominance, the boy spits at the toilet bowl, landing straight on your skull.

After wiping, he flushes the toilet and then goes out, knowing that a little ten year old kid just reduced a much bigger grown man into nothing more than a piece of shit.

The girl picks you up and tosses you into her mouth. *GULP* She swallows, and you enter her giant hungry stomach. It looks like there's some remains of other people in here, apparently this girl enjoys eating guys like you. Her stomach groans, and outside, you hear her burp.

Do you want to follow your digestion or switch to her POV?
134232.title: Eat you

1342321.content:
You beg and plead, but the little girl ignores you and goes to find something else (or someone else) to play with. Her stomach starts to make a lot of gurgling noises, and you realize that there's no hope for you. Accepting what cruel end fate has handed you, you let the acid break and melt you down. The girl burps again, as her stomach's many "blorps" and "glorps" amuse her. She smiles, not fully understanding what happens inside her tummy, but knowing that she has ended you all the same.

After a couple hours, nothing recognizable is left of your body. The little girl has already burped out some of your bones by this point, and what's left floats around in her empty stomach. Congratulations, you are nourishment for a five-year-old.
1342321.title: Digested

13423211.content:
The cute five-year-old girl rubs her recently emptied stomach. She faintly remembers the defiant face of her last meal, unwilling to play dolls with her. "He tasted so yummy", she thought back to the moment she swallowed him. Suddenly, her stomach let out a groaning cry of hunger. That snack has long since been digested. It's time for someone new.

The girl stomps down the sidewalk, watching groups of terrified tiny people scramble away from her. Some of them meet a quick and painful end under her feet as she walks. Eventually she gets bored of watching them, and plucks a dude at random between her thumb and index finger.

"Hiya!" She beamed with such an innocent smile, "I'm hungry and you're food! Yay!"

The man had no time to think before the girl popped the upper half of his body into her drooling mouth. She sucked on him for a bit as his legs feebly dangled around outside. His face met with the humid stench of her salivating maw as it was put through a wash cycle of the gooey stuff.

*SHLURP*

After toying with her new snack, the girl slurped up his body. He tasted really good too! Inside her mouth, the dude screamed at the sound of the young kid's growling tummy below, resonating up her throat as if calling to him.

*GULP*

The five-year-old girl giggled as she gulped the tiny man down. A lump passed through her throat before plopping miserably into her stomach. The man instantly gagged at the stale air permeating the small gurgling cavern. He never imagined such an adorable little girl hid a place so vile inside of her.

His screams and struggles went unheard, but the girl did enjoy feeling him bounce around scared inside her belly. She patted her tummy and it sounded like a drum.

*UUUURPPP* As per usual, a loud burp from the little girl signaled the ongoing digestion of the tiny person trapped in her hot, noisy stomach, eager to turn the snack into more nutrients and belches.
13423211.title: Girl's Gotta Eat
